title: Andy Wowhol Website
body: Andy Wowhol is a silly website that I made to get more familiar with Blizzard’s Game Data APIs, which provide game data for building World of Warcraft and Diablo III community sites. This was one of my first projects to use Node and Express.

The site is about as simple as it gets: you input your WoW character’s name and realm, it fetches the character’s avatar image from the API, and then displays it in four different color variations using CSS filters.
